text: Establishing lasting peace is the work of education all politics can do is keep us out of war.
author: Maria Montessori

text: In a World where people are surrounded by darkness, ignorance and fear, it is a sign of hope to be celebrating Islam's message of peace and light, and the last great Messenger, born and chosen to deliver them to all mankind.
author: Cat Stevens

text: An unjust peace is better than a just war.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: The purpose of all wars, is peace.
author: Saint Augustine

text: I get those fleeting, beautiful moments of inner peace and stillness - and then the other 23 hours and 45 minutes of the day, I'm a human trying to make it through in this world.
author: Ellen DeGeneres
